mapper.select: SELECT a.attraction_id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(au.attraction_user_id) DESC) AS `rank`, COUNT(au.attraction_user_id) AS count, a.title, a.first_image, a.map_x, a.map_y, a.address FROM attractions a JOIN attraction_user au ON a.attraction_id = au.attraction_id GROUP BY a.attraction_id ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT #{limit}
